text: John J. Sarna (born March 9, 1935) is an American politician in the state of Minnesota. He served in the Minnesota House of Representatives from 1973 to 1992 and was a Democrat.Minnesota Legislators Past & Present: John Sarna ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Minneapolis Category:Minnesota Democrats Category:Members of the Minnesota House of Representatives
title: John Sarna
